title: Chapter 1: Physical World and Measurement (First paper)
details: This chapter teaches the basics of measurement and physical quantities.

title: Chapter 2: Vector (First paper)
details: This chapter mainly teaches about vector quantities.

title: Chapter 3: Dynamics (First paper)
details: This chapter contains a clear idea about motion of moving objects and their calculation.

title: Chapter 4: Newtonian Mechanics (First paper)
details: This chapter will let you know about different laws of Newtonian mechanics and it's application.

title: Chapter 5: Work, Energy and Power (First paper)
details: This chapter gives you a clear idea about work, power and energy.

title: Chapter 6: Gravitation and gravity (First paper)
details: This chapter teaches you about different laws of gravitation.

title: Chapter 7: Structural properties of matter (First paper)
details: This chapter is about solid, liquid and gaseous matter and how they behave in different situations.

title: Chapter 8: Periodic motion (First paper)
details: This chapter teacher you the basics of a motion called periodic motion.

title: Chapter 9: Wave (First paper)
details: You will know about the mechanism of waves in this chapter.

title: Chapter 10: Ideal gas and kinetic theory of gas (First paper)
details: This chapter will let you know about ideal gases and kinetic theory of gas.

title: Chapter 8: Periodic motion (First paper)
details: This chapter teacher you the basics of a motion called periodic motion.
